website_summaries.verdict: If quality is important, but you don't want to sacrifice flavor, this high protein option offers a great balance. One of the best tasting casein protein powders out there.
pros: Quality, slow release micellar casein and a low calorie count make this shake an ideal bedtime snack
Contains 25g of protein with 2.3g of L-leucine to stimulate protein synthesis
Mixes well and comes in a variety of rich and delicious flavors
No sugar, low carbs, and low fat
cons: Contains some artificial flavorings and sweeteners

customer_reviews.title: Decent protein with nice taste
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with it. And there are 2 major reasons for that: 1. It's not over sweetened, the taste is great 2. It has no redundant additives in it I normally take it before bed to cease hunger and gain no weight, in spite, my weight keeps well maintained. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy

customer_reviews.title: Tastes horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product at all. It is overly artificially sweetened and tastes like chemicals. It was very difficult to get down, even when I tried blending with ice, unsweetened almond milk and almond butter. I will be giving it away and will not be repurchasing. I bought this because of the great reviews, but was very disappointed. I am used to About Time chocolate casein which is much more natural tasting. I will go back to that brand.
customer_reviews.author: Star123

customer_reviews.title: It tastes terrible
customer_reviews.text: I don't know whether it is just because it's casein, but I have the cinnamon bun flavor and it tastes like I'm just having the powder. It mixes terribly with milk especially. It does give results at the end of the day which is why I gave it the 2nd star but I was really expecting a lot better in terms of taste...
customer_reviews.author: Rohan Prakash

customer_reviews.title: Very vanilla, powerful aroma, mixes easy
customer_reviews.text: I stack this protein with Nitrotech Protein for pre and after workouts and this Elite Casein between meals and before bed. This protein powder is very aromatic, powerful vanilla scent throughout the room if you leave the top open..nice sweet vanilla taste, mixes nicely, definitely a high quality nutritional supplement for a leaner healthier body. "All the aminos the body needs". I will keep buying here from Amazon and you should too for the greatest selection at the best prices.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S

customer_reviews.title: How can I trust this brand now?
customer_reviews.text: When I received my first canister of Elite Casein Protein Powder I was surprised by how large the scoop was compared to my other whey protein powder formulas I take but generally satisfied. When I reordered it I found a scooper in the container that was less than 1/3 the size. No difference in either the formula or the serving recommendations. Obviously one (or both) of these containers had the wrong scooper in it. Makes me wonder what other errors were made in the formulating, blending and manufacture of the product which is presumably much more difficult than dropping the correct sized scooper in... I've completely lost faith and confidence in this brand and could not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Burke Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great if you like drinking dust
customer_reviews.text: Man.. it does not matter how much I try and mix this up, it just feels like I'm drinking dust. I've shook this powder in my bottle with 18oz of water for 5 straight minutes and i just will not mix properly. It tastes decent but It's nothing to write home about. I've seen other people say the scoop included is larger than the recommended serving size and I tried using only ~3/4 of the scoop and that helped with the mixing but it just ain't happening using the full scoop. I ended up giving it away to a friend and using another brand that I'm much more pleased with. I will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like the taste
customer_reviews.text: It tastes horrible. I used ON Chocolate Supreme Casein before and decided to try Dymatize because of the reviews and lots of people in my gym community love it. Unfortunately, I don’t like how it tastes at all. The taste is so artificial and too sweet for me. Also it’s very watery. I used the same amount of water as I used with ON (which has a nice thick texture, like a chocolate shake) but it’s too watery, like drinking sweet dirty water. It mixes well in a shaker bottle thought, without any clumps. I really wanted to love it because it’s slightly cheaper than ON but can’t stand the taste.
customer_reviews.author: anastasiia kulin

customer_reviews.title: Creamy and super sweet
customer_reviews.text: I use the cinnamon bun flavor in my oatmeal almost every day. It makes it so creamy and mixes in really easy. Replaced some of the flour and sugar in a banana bread recipe with this. So. Good. But the flavor is more like the icing on cinnamon bun, really sweet with just a bit of cinnamon flavor. Good thing I know how to put cinnamon in my oatmeal. I'm excited to try other flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Cinnamon Sand Water... 🤢
customer_reviews.text: While the macros in this product are on point for the price, I can't get past the gritiness of the shake. No matter how much water or milk you add to it, and no matter how much you shake, the powder stays separated in the from the liquid. It feels like you are drinking water with sand in it. I am not very particularly about flavor, consistency, etc., but this is just rough to drink, despite the fact that I don't mind the flavor. I would only tried the Cinnamon one, so maybe the others are different, but this one was rough, and I would recommend another product...
customer_reviews.author: brent

customer_reviews.title: Chalky
customer_reviews.text: Chalky, overly sweet, and lots of artificial ingredients. Not the cleanest or best mixing casein protein. Consistency is quite chalky. The taste is close to a cinnamon roll but artificially sweet. I personally don't feel like I recover as well using this product as I have with other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I find the Vanilla cloyingly sweet
customer_reviews.text: i like the nutritional make-up of this powder, but everytime I use it I nearly gag because it is so cloyingly sweet. Way too sweet for my taste. Maybe it's where I'm cutting back on sweets overall, but the first time I tried this I knew I would regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MichiganTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Sweetened w Sucralose (Splenda) - WAY TOO SWEET
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is WAY TOO SWEET...to the point it is disgusting. They say on their website they use Stevia in their products....but not in this one. I called Dymatize and they acted evasive...as if they knew there was the issue. For some reason they don't even offer an unsweetened product. Needless to say I am throwing this stuff out and opting for an unsweetened product.
customer_reviews.author: Pragmatist

customer_reviews.title: So changes have been made!!
customer_reviews.text: The scoop changed. 1 serving is still 36 grams but now you need to use 2 smaller scoops rather than 1 large scoop. Not a huge issue. I enjoy this product but it comes with risks, such as the artificial ingredients. Make sure you keep a balance in your diet. If possible natural whole food sources is always better than processed food. Great value, Mixes well with almond milk. Enjoy and get swole !!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: From a former ON fan... Dymatize makes an excellent Casein product
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy my preferred ON brand casein from Bodybuilding.com, but they were out of my flavor. So I gave this brand a try... and I am HOOKED! It mixes ok (an issue for all casein) but absolutely delicious and provides the slow protein release that I want for recovery. This is now my NEW, GO-TO brand and flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Love Dymatize Proteins
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of Dymatize products. They blend easily with water by just shaking (and I do not use the little shaker ball in the cup). The vanilla flavor is very mild and smooth tasting. I use the Casein protein at night before bed for the slow burn process.
customer_reviews.author: ButterBean6536Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet, hard to mix.
customer_reviews.text: I got the cinnamon roll flavor and it is cloyingly sweet, and I love sweets. In addition this stuff is very very thick if mixed with Almond Milk. Very had to get the clumps out. Won't be buying Dymatize again and will stick with my old brand.
customer_reviews.author: Shadynasty

customer_reviews.title: Good even though a little gritty
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying any kind of casein powder and I was pleased with this one. It has a rich chocolate flavor that I really enjoyed. It does have a bit of grittiness to it but it's not that bad. I've used it to make shakes, protein ice cream, and brownies, and they all came out pretty good. I will definitely be buying more and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quick Protein Drink Combo
customer_reviews.text: I usually use a whey and casein protein combo to get the immediate whey repair and the longer lasting casein digestion. It helps following my morning workout and gets me about halfway through the day still feeling full. I use it again after my evening workout to slowly digest through the night. The casein adds a creaminess to the quick drink I make in the blender with vanilla flavored almond milk. Hence it provides better flavor, texture and a feeling of fullness than the whey protein alone. The chocolate flavor is also pretty good. One of the better proteins I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Horner

customer_reviews.title: Bad Aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: I have always really liked Dymatize protein, but I am not a fan of this one at all. It has a really bad aspartame aftertaste, and I always feel slightly nauseous when I finish consuming it. The texture is ok, and it keeps you full for a long time like most other casein proteins, but overall I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Cinnamon Bun Casein Powder
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting Casein protein I have tried so far. Casein and whey protein are different, so you can't expect it to taste as good as whey. This one is actually good enough to drink, whereas others I have tried are so bad tasting that I have to make them into mug cakes in order to use them. Casein will always be thicker than whey, so don't expect it to go down as easily. In my opinion, Dymatize has the best tasting protein powder across the board (try the chocolate peanut butter whey), even over Gold Standards top-rated flavors. Taste-wise, you can't go wrong with Dymatize!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B.

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of products before but this is one of the best in the market. I love the taste and how it make me full but not bloated. Most products out there make you bloated and you get a lot of gas. I would recommend this any day and anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Said and Christen

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: Best taste I've ever had. I have probably tried over 10 brands and types of chocolate protein powder over the years. This is the best I've ever had. I blend it with coffee and it blends well in a blender without all the gross foam others leave. Stirring it in coffee is ok. Your typical chunks but they eventually dissolve. I don't use a blender ball since I mix with hot coffee. It keeps me full for 3-5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: I like the taste!
customer_reviews.text: I use it with my meals during the day. People say use casein at night. But I found that casine instead of whey during the day helps keep me full a lot longer because casein digests slower than whey protein. If your goal is dieting to lose weight, I recommend using this.
customer_reviews.author: Liz McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Cinnabon flavor very good late night before bed shake.
customer_reviews.text: Got Casein to take before bead to insure my protein macro is on par while I'm sleeping as I'm bulking right now. Flavor was amazing mixed with whole milk, heavy whipping cream, sugar free Cool whip and penut butter using emulsion blender. Very simple, I'm on low carb and the flavour was a real treat, mixed well.
customer_reviews.author: samuel

customer_reviews.title: I have the chocolate flavor and I love it, tastes the best with water
customer_reviews.text: I have the chocolate flavor and I love it, tastes the best with water. I am a huge sugar addict and it helps with my sugar cravings so I can have this instead of brownies or something. I am working out and trying to eat well so I am not sure the exact difference its making as far as building muscle because I do see results but I have also made dramatic changes. My favorite part of this is the help I get with my sugar cravings and it motivates me to workout since I kind of use it as a reward for myself at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Babes Aves

customer_reviews.title: Is all casein like this?
customer_reviews.text: I've never had casein powder before, but I have almost a decade of experience with whey. I am not sure if this brand or casein in general, but the powder felt very thick like there were sediments floating around in it. Over 1 month in and think I have only used 3-4 servings. Will try ON next time instead of trying to save a few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: good protien chocolate flavor
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact it helps recover at night and keeps you full. Getting results and the flavor is nice. Like a ice cream shake! Wish they used stevia in it instead of sucralose. Its not cheap but quality is top notch though. No problems with upset stomach either.
customer_reviews.author: john a

customer_reviews.title: Not the best flavor
customer_reviews.text: I was actually surprised at the odd flavor from this protein powder. Dymatize normally has really nice flavoring. This has a very odd, non chocolate, taste and an aftertaste. I would try a different flavor.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: This trick makes it taste great!
customer_reviews.text: For a protien powder it doesn't taste that bad, but there is a great trick for getting rid of after taste to make it taste like real chocolate. Mix with hot water and drink right away. No kidding, it tastes just like hot chocolate with no diet/weirdness taste. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like a milkshake
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting protein powder I've ever had. And that's just the vanilla flavor. I blend a scoop of this with milk and frozen strawberries + bananas and it tastes just like a milkshake. No weird aftertaste or texture. It's very filling and I will sometimes have a smoothie made with this and fruit for lunch. I m going to try to make protein pudding out of this next.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Good casein protein shake, but you cannot bake or cook with it
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of protein and can say this is a solid vanilla casein shake. Not too thick, like optimum nutrition (ON Casein is horrible consistency and flavor). And flavor is ok. (I don’t find myself craving it like I do ISO-100 flavors) I tried to bake pancakes and brownies with this and it will simply not bake, it just goes flat. (Multiple recipes) Since I haven’t seen other reviews trying to bake or cook with this protein, I thought I would provide my 2 cents. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Joe P.

customer_reviews.title: Casein like it should be.
customer_reviews.text: It's one of the better casein powders that I have had and while it doesn't taste amazing, which it still tastes decent, it does break down in water very well and that is something I haven't had from a few other products. The flavoring is subtle and could use a bit more, but it is enough to let you know it exists somewhere in there.
customer_reviews.author: TheInexperiencedPro

customer_reviews.title: Chalky but not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: The cookies and cream flavor took some getting used to. This was my first experience with casein, so I'll give my novice opinion. Don't expect it to taste like dessert and be prepared for a chalkier protein than whey. Make sure to use enough liquid, or else you'll be choking down a chalky sludge. Now that I've been using it for a while, I can say that I'm used to the taste and it's been helpful for hitting my macros on days that I'm light, and having an easy option for a before-bed snack.
customer_reviews.author: James Haskins

customer_reviews.title: If you can afford it buy with whey
customer_reviews.text: Casein protein. Best tasting protein powder I have ever used. More expensive than similar whey protein blend. Best thing you can do is just use this before bed, casein is very slow protein to break down. Much slower than a whey protein. So, it will get you through most of night. Use a good Whey protein during day.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cici

customer_reviews.title: great taste
customer_reviews.text: Good Casein product. I do like the chocolate flavor. Its a nice protein supplement to take at night for those looking to increase protein intake as part of a weight lifting program.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Flavor and Results
customer_reviews.text: I have found that drinking this 1 hr to 1/2 before going to bed my sleeping has dramatically improved. My muscles definitely tend to feel less sore after a heavy lifting day if I have a serving of this casein before bed. I wouldn't say it physically works any better or worse than any other casein I have had. However; it mixes smoother, it tastes better, and it is one of the best prices/gram that I have found. Mix it with 8 0z Cashew Milk, 8 0z water, 1 serving pb fit for an awesome flavor.
customer_reviews.author: jtgidden88

customer_reviews.title: Overall Dymatize makes some of the best protein on the market and they whey flavors are ...
customer_reviews.text: Flavors are limited and unless you spend twenty mins shaking it up in your water, it clumps and sticks to the top. Overall Dymatize makes some of the best protein on the market and they whey flavors are to die for. I am hoping that they can add more flavors to their Casein without sacrificing the goodness of the Casein.
customer_reviews.author: Heather J.

customer_reviews.title: This taste DELICIOUS!!!! Taste just like a cereal!!!
customer_reviews.text: This taste DELICIOUS!!!!!!! Possibly the best tasting casein I have ever bought! Do you know the cereal Cinnamon Toast Crunch?! Well THIS TASTE JUST LIKE IT!!!!! I drink one for my last meal of the day before bed. It gets me extremely full but it does have an effect that it quickly makes me sleepy from how full I am lol. Which I don’t mind at all since it’s about to be time for bed. Highly recommend to try this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Geneva C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Protein
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of protein powders over the years and this is definitely my favorite so far. If you use casein you know it's generally thicker than whey with a different flavor profile. This protein mixes extremely well and doesn't clump up anywhere near as much as other casein proteins I've used. But what I really like about it is the taste. It's now my favorite tasting protein by far. Highly recommend it. Tastes better and mixes better than Optimum Nutrition in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: David V

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein in existence in my opinion (I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting protein in existence in my opinion (I bought the chocolate flavor). It dissolves so smoothly and has such a small after taste that it's non existent. I've bought proteins that literally cost three times more from name brands that taste 1/10 the quality of this. I've tried other flavors and their definitely not as good. Amazing protein and I recommend it to everyone I know who uses supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, awesome consistency - I've re-ordered twice now.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great, awesome consistency, used with blender bottle and blender with great results. I used it at night and saw a noticeable improvement in my mood the next day (see research on slow proteins before bed to reduce "hangry" feeling in the morning). Also was a help in a great mass gain cycle for me but had similar results with GNC's Gold Casein brand.
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Taste fine but bad on my stomach. Sticking to isolate
customer_reviews.text: Got the chocolate flavor and it tasted better than other brands I have tried. Mixes well and has a nice consistency to drink. However, this made my bowel movements unbearable. I have minor stomach issues with regular whey protein but nothing like I experienced with casein. I love this brands whey isolate and will be sticking to that from now on
customer_reviews.author: Kitsune Kai

customer_reviews.title: Favorite casein
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is great and it mixes well. I eat it as pudding every night before bed and it satisfies my sweet tooth, without containing a ton of sugar and carbs. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste for Casein
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few different casein protein powders and I was not impressed until this one. Great chocolate taste. I usually mix in fruit like strawberries or bananas and it goes great with Dannon Low Fat yogurt. It creates a rich taste that blends well with anything that tastes good with chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: StephenC

customer_reviews.title: Taste barely tolerable with chalky consistency
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not rich chocolate. It’s barely tolerable. Hopefully it’s benefits are worth having to choke this down. Will definitely be buying a different brand after tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Especially before bed--helps with muscle recovery & growth
customer_reviews.text: We use this Casein protein mainly about 2 hours before bedtime because Casein releases amino acids slowly so before bedtime allows to help with recovery and reduce muscle breakdown while sleeping. Also boosts muscle growth!!
customer_reviews.author: Directec

customer_reviews.title: great for any time of day
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty, great for any time of day. Only slight problem, for me, is that it's a little thicker than whey protein, which bothers me if I happen to be feeling a little queasy. But, it's a very small complaint, especially when this stuff tastes like chocolate milk and not tree bark, like so many other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Henson

customer_reviews.title: No sugary aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tasting mix. Got the chocolate flavor. It doesn’t leave that super sweet aftertaste that other powders do. I mixed it out smooth in a bullet blender with almond milk and ice so it didn’t come out clumpy or chalky for me. And it really is filling before bed.
customer_reviews.author: BigB83

customer_reviews.title: Taste good, mixes well, seems to work
customer_reviews.text: The taste is quite close to a cinnamon bun which is nice. With a few ice cubes, pouring water than a scoop, then adding water into a blender bottle seemed to work well with minimal to none powder leftover. Definitely heavy enough to put you into content, muscles feels better the following day.
customer_reviews.author: BENJAMIN JKRS B 1

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: The cinnamon bun flavor is the best I've had. It muxes pretty darn good. Sure maybe a little bit of clumping on the stem of the spoon, but it mixes really easily. And the casein protein works well for longer-lasting recovery. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Gummed up so bad, it wasn't even drinkable
customer_reviews.text: Wow, where to begin. I go about mixing my casein like any other day, I put it in a blender bottle, mix it with water, and shake it up. Immediately when I add the water, this powder gums up to the consistency of tooth paste. All of the water literally gets absorbed and I'm left with something that resembles fluoride dental paste. Part of me feels like I got a tampered with batch, because I can't understand how anyone could drink this stuff otherwise. -SP
customer_reviews.author: Derek Newell

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure how this would taste as I always get the chocolate but I love the cinnamon bun. Only negative is that this company only fills 3/4 of the container
customer_reviews.author: Kristy H.

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: This flavor of protein powder is so yummy. Just mix it up and it's fantastic and also beneficial. My boyfriend and I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and effective
customer_reviews.text: I make a show with casein at night. It keeps me full and tastes good. I prefer the chocolate. No aftertaste. It’s low in carbs and fat which gives room for people to add own ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: angela n.

customer_reviews.title: My go-to Casein
customer_reviews.text: My go-to to Casein. Can't beat the nutrition label, value for the money, and taste. I've tried countless proteins and supplements from every company. Dymatize is definitely aligns with what I'm seeking in a Casein protein product.
customer_reviews.author: M J

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Slightly gritty but has a really good chocolate flavor. I will buy again! It had the highest protein & lowest carb count for the money & I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor casein I have tried
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor as far as Casein goes. I tend to add a little more than the recommended of fluid oz. of silk vanilla almond milk, ground up steel cut oats, and a bit of cinnamon for personal flavor and consistency preference and macro goals. A little bit tends to stick to the sides of my blender or shaker bottle which can be annoying. Otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Will Brown

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delicious
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite protein and the flavor is amazing also. I love making protein ice cream with it among other things.
customer_reviews.author: GJ™️

customer_reviews.title: Can mix with water
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder doesn’t have that weird protein taste. I mix it with ice and water instead of milk and it is yummy. You have to watch the price though as it just increased and I know I can get it cheaper elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Russell

customer_reviews.title: I most have gotten a defective one
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, I received an almost empty one. It was sealed and all, and I even weighted it and it's not 2 pounds!!! It's 1.4Lb
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Never would have believed how delicious it is!
customer_reviews.text: Cinnamon bun flavor: I'm blown away by this stuff. It tastes like an awesome, thick, creamy milkshake just by adding water only! Flavor is great, just like you'd hope from the description. Thick, creamy mouthfeel and not grainy in texture. Mixes easily and quickly. Dream come true!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: With the price being lower than my previous casein I thought this would probably not taste that great since it is cheaper but decided to give it a try. I love the flavor and it is perfect to make casein cookies or just drinking with water.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Magdaleno

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great but use lots of water!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes fantastic and the specs are awesome. The scoops are huge though. Like half a cup. You need a good 20 oz of liquid to make it the right consistency. Not a deal breaker though. For the price it's great.
customer_reviews.author: bustap949

customer_reviews.title: Just Gross
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe how sweet and nauseating this stuff is. It is like drinking flour even with water or rice milk. it tastes like a giant bag of stevia, I had to buy something else. so disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Staubs

customer_reviews.title: Tasty chocolate
customer_reviews.text: This was all the rave on the group I am on for a dieting programme and decided to try it out. I did not expect that it was so huge, I liked it even more for that. It tastes very nice and does not have an after taste. The chocolate flavor is not overpowering at all. Overall looking forward to my night time casein encounter :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate flavor still has chalky taste/feel
customer_reviews.text: This is my first casein protein powder, I take it before bed usually. The main drawback is the flavor, I like the chocolate but you definitely get the chalky protein powder taste. They don't do as well as some other brands (non-casein) that I use.
customer_reviews.author: Peter L

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is Great and delicious
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is Great and delicious. When mixed with water still has a milkshake consistency. And when blended with a few ice cubes, it make a satisfying dessert. I read a Bodybuilders TOP 10 list where this was the winner... and now I know why.
customer_reviews.author: ADecentOne

customer_reviews.title: Dymatize Elite
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that it has soy in it . Soy is bad for your thyroid . It does taste great but is sweet . I drank a shake after supper last night and woke up with hands feeling swollen . Wished I had bought smaller size
customer_reviews.author: Clyde B. Meece, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good pricing.
customer_reviews.text: It certainly tastes like a cinnamon bun, but the addition of the sunflower creamer isn't necessary as I mix mine with milk. The creamer itself gives it a slight flavor that's noticeable, but overall the product is still good and I'm happy to have opted to try it over some others.
customer_reviews.author: James P. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of different protein powders and really like this one, mixes really easy and taste great, last a long time in this giant container.
customer_reviews.author: D_Man3

customer_reviews.title: Great taste! Blends well.
customer_reviews.text: I had never had casein so this was my first go at it. I ordered the cinnamon bun. I mixed it with skim milk using an immersion blender. It is pretty fantastic. I am very pleased and will most likely buy again. May even try the chocolate, but the cinnabon is great.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: This gainer is more healthy than most I've come across and does a good job of putting weight on athletes. Highly recommend to any athlete trying to put some weight on while lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Gave me horrible gas
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is an awesome protein for some but it gave me horrible gas and had to stop using it. Switched to ON Gold Standard Casein and have no problems. Could be sweeter they use that doesn't sit well with me.
customer_reviews.author: MJackson

customer_reviews.title: minimal carbs - GREAT, slow metabolism Protein for later in the day
customer_reviews.text: minimal carbs - GREAT, slow metabolism Protein for later in the day.. PERFECT.. taste is great, have had 2 flavors now Cinnamon Bun and Smooth Vanilla, zero complaints.. thank you
customer_reviews.author: thepak92

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Wow I was surprised how big it was. And it’s not half way full is at least 3/4 of the way full or more. The taste isn’t bad. I was able to drink it with fat free milk. I weighed out my scoop using a scale.
customer_reviews.author: Fanta

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable protein powder
customer_reviews.text: A pretty good tasting protein shake. First casein protein I have tried, so I don't have much reference to compare but as for the cinnamon bun, came out great. Is a bit on the thick side, I did half and half of water and almond milk. Can bit a bit clumpy but not a deal breaker. Just have to shake a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good and makes great pudding
customer_reviews.text: Good consistency and tastes good 4/5 taste, gets nice and thick for pudding.
customer_reviews.author: S. D.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: The best Dymatize casein product I can remember buying. Would repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Trottier

customer_reviews.title: It mixes well and the taste is sweet; but not overly sweet
customer_reviews.text: It mixes well and the taste is sweet; but not overly sweet. I bought the cinnamon bun flavor. It doesn't taste anything like cinnamon bun. For some reason I feel it has more of a coconut under tone to the flavor. Wasn't terrible, but I will not buy this flavor again.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing buy again
customer_reviews.text: Taste amazing an I have been taking protein for 10 years. Also making me get more gains at the gym. I have tried BAN, Muscle Pharm, Optimum Nutrition and My Protein and this is way better by far. It taste better than cinnamon strussel
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hot chocolate.
customer_reviews.text: Mixes smooth. It is thicker but it's perfect to make a hot chocolate at the end of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Soooo thick
customer_reviews.text: The flavor, oh the flavor. It just coats your whole mouth and doesn't go away, in a bad way
customer_reviews.author: vmm312

customer_reviews.title: You are yum
customer_reviews.text: I don't order it as often anymore, but when I do I tend to like it better than food and live off of it until the container is empty
customer_reviews.author: Ivy  Imboden

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I would say it's the best one. Taste like chocolate milkshake. Works fine.
customer_reviews.author: SHUVO

customer_reviews.title: Taste bad
customer_reviews.text: Cannot stand for the taste! Too much artificial in it. Will try other brands next time.
customer_reviews.author: David Webb

customer_reviews.title: Impressive taste
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how well this protein tastes. Smooth and not chalky compared to others. It is worth the try.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate casein tastes good and tastes even better with some almond milk and a little PB2. A little on the pricey side.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: One of the best tasting proteins shakes I've drank and effective mixes great
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Knott

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic supper filling
customer_reviews.text: 😋 yummy. Fantastic supper filling. Best snack to have before bed. I’ll be buying more as soon as I run out. 😋😋
customer_reviews.author: gerardo jimenez

customer_reviews.title: I did like this -but the artificial flavor was pretty strong
customer_reviews.text: I did like this -but the artificial flavor was pretty strong. I wanted to try a different flavor but many only come in 4lb sizes so I switched to bulk nutrition plain casein so I can make my own!!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: This product was horrifically bad, I gag while I choke it down. The taste would be tolerable if it wasn’t such a terrible texture. The closest thing I could describe this texture as is disintegrated styrofoam. Doesn’t blend in well at all. And I tried everything. Water. Almond milk. Shaker. Blender. Even with ice it separates. I can’t make it tolerable
customer_reviews.author: amber d curtis

customer_reviews.title: Delicious chocolate flavor
customer_reviews.text: Love this casein ! Was using Ascent before but this one is great and not chalky at all. I use water only with this and it’s delcious ! I am so full after i have this before bed ! I won’t go back to Ascent . Bummed there are artificial flavors but what ya gonna do
customer_reviews.author: kikimommy

customer_reviews.title: Very enjoyable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I read a great many reviews prior to ordering this and it proved to get me to just the product I needed and enjoy. It is easy to prepare and so versatile to change it up with fresh fruit or other items you enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Taste amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Cinnamon bun flavor is really good! After trying another brands casein Dymatize is in a class by itself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible after taste
customer_reviews.text: This casein has the worse after taste. I've had a lot of different protein powders, but this one, by far, is the worse tasting. It finishes with a horrible chemical-like taste. It's like drinking copper.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: great flavor with milk and some peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: great taste once you mix it right. when making your shake think milk shake the more you add the better it taste
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I've been using ON Casein for years, but thought I'd give something else a try. I like how this mixes a little bit thinner than ON, and the taste is good as well. Price is similar, but, due to the consistency being a bit more favorable, I think I'll give Dymatize a go from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Rmo002

customer_reviews.title: Mmmhh.. Cinnamon Bun
customer_reviews.text: Mix it with Greek Yogurt, add some SF Cool Whip. Or blend it up with some almond milk. It is quite delicious. I also make my own quest-like protein bars and protein popsicles. This stuff is tasty! And Dymatize is one of a few suppliers I totally trust. Their quality is first rate.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Marshall

customer_reviews.title: THE MOST DELICIOUS PROTEIN POWDER!!
customer_reviews.text: A friend told me about this brand and the birthday cake flavor and I had to try it. My mind was blown. It legit tastes like the halo top birthday cake ice cream! With less than 1g of sugar and 25g of protein. I love it! I WILL be buying more! I'm addicted!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried some terrible tasting casein but gave this one a try based on other reviews. Maybe I was aiming the bar really low but I love it and would definitely buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Gertrude

product_meta.title: Dymatize Elite Casein Protein Powder, Slow Absorbing with Muscle Building Amino Acids, 100% Micellar Casein, 25g Protein, 5.4g BCAAs & 2.3g Leucine, Helps Overnight Recovery, Cookies & Cream, 4 Pound
product_meta.description: Flavor:Cookies & Cream| Size:4 Pound (Pack of 1)Dymatize Elite Casein provides 25 grams of slow digesting Casein protein per serving. Dymatize 100% Casein is specifically designed to digest more slowly in your body than other rapid release protein sources, such as whey. This slow digestion is a result of the natural pH sensitivity of Casein protein in the digestive track. Because of the natural thickening effect of Dymatize 100% Casein in the low pH environment of the stomach, a prolonged and steady release of protein is obtained. In fact, the resulting digestion can take more than twice as long as other forms of protein. This delayed digestion is often desirable, especially at bedtime or other periods when your body may go for an extended period without food.
feature_bullets: 25 grams of protein from 100% micellar casein, a sustained-absorbing protein for prolonged muscle support
5 grams of BCAAs, including 2.3 grams of L-Leucine per serving for muscle support and recovery
Ideal for overnight sustained muscle growth and repair, or other extended periods of time between meals
Provides a sustained release of muscle building amino acids to support muscle growth and recovery
4 lbs of Dymatize Elite 100% Micellar Casein Cookies & Cream Protein Powder (53 Servings)

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
